headline: Air Fryer Brats
name: Air Fryer Brats
description: Crispy, juicy, tender air fryer brats have the perfect texture without firing up the grill.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the air fryer to 380 degrees F (193 degrees C). Spray the fryer basket with cooking spray or use an air fryer disposable parchment liner.

Place brats in the air fryer basket, being sure not to overcrowd, leaving some room around them. Cook until browned, flipping halfway through cooking time, 12 to 15 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted near the center should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C).
